text: Faither: The day's the day ye stert the scuil, intit?
Faither: A mind ma time et the scuil, yaised tae get intae rammies aw the time.
Faither: Yer no the biggest wean son, yer a wee skinny malink.
Faither: If wa o thae boays sterts et ye, ye hiv tae hit thaim back.
Faither: Ye'll come oot it sair, bit ye cannae let folk walk ower ye.
Faither: Mind at, n ye'll be awricht.
Faither: Right. wull we head aff?
Faither: Hiv ye seen ma bunnet onie whaur?
Faither: Help me fin ma bunnet an we kin lea.
Faither: Mibbie yer mither kens whaur a left it.
